title: 42 different Major League Postcards - Moved to Ebay
author: Greenmonster

posts.post_title: 42 different Major League Postcards - Moved to Ebay
posts.post_content:
Lot of 42 different standard size chrome postcards, dating 1960-1980, major league ballparks.  Includes Fenway Park, Wrigley Field, Three Rivers, Forbes, Arlington Stadium, Anaheim Stadium, San Diego Stadium, Yankee Stadium, Busch Memorial Stadium, Candlestick Park, Atlanta Stadium, D.C. Stadium.

Only 5 of the 42 have been postally used, overall excellent condition.
On Ebay

PayPal F&F, Check or Money Order.

Thank you.

Jim
